full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI BSKANG GSO'I CHO GA'I ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI BSKANG GSO'I CHO GA 'DI NI PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG RJE DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'DI'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS LA GZHI BLANGS 'DE'I BSKANG GSO'I YIG SNYING SOGS GZHAN LAS KYANG CUNG ZAD RE RE @008A *, ,BLANGS DER: BTZUN CHUNG MA TI MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)DGE BA 'DI YIS RIGS 'DZIN BDAG CAG GIS: 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PA DANG: RANG RIG DON GYI RTA MGRIN DBANG GI RGYAL: TSE 'DI NYID LA MNGON DU 'GYUR BAR SHOG ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GUNG PAndI TA RDO RJE BSOD NAMS MING CAN GYIS BDE CHEN BYANG CHUB GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
